To whom this may concern,

Hillcote house is a residential respite home in Salisbury where children with disabilities can stay overnight in a safe,caring and happy environment. It has been running for thirty years and has helped hundreds of people with the brilliant services that are handed out by there staff.

Wiltshire council are purposing to close down Hillcote in April 2014.

We need as much support and urge you to sign this petition to stop this from happening so future residents can enjoy there stay.

We would like the Government to take full action on this very serious matter and support us in this petition to save Hillcote from closing and let it continue its excellent services.

Thank you for your time, Kind regards.
